citations.narrative:
There were no acquisition or current inventory records for the chickens. Failure to maintain these records can make it
difficult to assess the health of the animals and keep track of animals. Licensee must maintain records containing the
required information for animals which disclose the number of animals held, owned, acquired, or disposed of including
births and deaths. Correct by October 15, 2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.75(b)(1) 
   
Records: Dealers and exhibitors. 
There were no acquisition or current inventory records for the chickens. Failure to maintain these records can make it 
difficult to assess the health of the animals and keep track of animals. Licensee must maintain records containing the 
required information for animals which disclose the number of animals held, owned, acquired, or disposed of including 
births and deaths. Correct by October 15, 2023. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative. 
 
 n
